| History                 = When [[Scott Lang (Earth-616)|Ant-Man]] was attacked by [[Wade Wilson (Earth-103173)|Dogpool]] inside the [[Stark Tower (Columbus Circle, Original)|Avengers Tower]], [[Sunny (Dog) (Earth-616)|Sunny the Sentry Dog]], came to his rescue. Sunny hit Dogpool so hard that he sent it to [[Europe]] where Dogpool landed in [[Geneva (Switzerland)|Geneva]], in the CERN Research Center and there he used the Hadron Collider on Sunny, depowering him, but at the same time freeing the [[Void Mutt (Earth-616)|Void Mutt]] that was imprisoned inside Sunny, and thanks to this he told Dogpool that it would make his death less excruciating.{{r|Deadpool Family Vol 1 1}}
